palaces.疾厄: Your physical hardware and health foundation
palaces.遷移: Your external interface and how others see you
palaces.官祿: Your career track and execution strength
palaces.福德: Your spiritual depth and inner balance

stars.officer: External benefactor: social resources, dependence on others
stars.helper: Internal support: self-regulation, pursuit of perfection
stars.scholar: External learning: credentials, pursuit of social recognition
stars.artist: Internal talent: artistic gift, desire for beauty
stars.money: Stable resources: security, dependence on material
stars.assistant: External benefactor: opportunity, dependence on authority
stars.aide: Internal benefactor: intuition, pursuit of spirituality
stars.impulsive: Burst: impatience, impulse, accumulation of anger
stars.ideologue: Sense of emptiness: insecurity, escape from reality
stars.fickle: Sense of loss: disillusionment, fear of owning

tenGods.食神: Output and creation, enjoyment and expression
tenGods.正印: Protection and nourishment, knowledge and benefactors

木.headline: Strategy module
木.content: Wood energy represents your strategy module, the built-in system for your expansion and initiation. When strong, you plan well, are willing to start, and can run multiple threads; when weak, you hesitate, struggle to launch, and lack strategic thinking. Use this energy for long-term strategy and starting new projects to boost execution and growth. When over-relying, you may plan too much and execute too little. This year, practice direct action—let strategy guide action rather than delay.

火.headline: Propulsion module
火.content: Fire energy represents your propulsion module, the built-in system for execution and burst. When strong, you advance quickly with high execution; when weak, you lack momentum and struggle to push through. Use this energy for key tasks and decisive execution to boost efficiency and output. When over-relying, you may burn out. This year, practice managing output rhythm so each push has more endurance.

土.headline: Endurance module
土.content: Earth energy represents your endurance module, the built-in system for settling and accumulation. When strong, you persist, accumulate results, and build systems; when weak, you struggle to sustain and lack foundation. Use this energy for long-term assets and stable workflows to boost accumulation and stability. When over-relying, you may become too conservative. This year, practice balancing accumulation with innovation.

金.headline: Decisiveness module
金.content: Metal energy represents your decisiveness module, the built-in system for cutting and logical discipline. When strong, you decide decisively, cut clearly, and establish processes; when weak, you struggle to decide and lack standards. Use this energy for clear processes and decision criteria to boost efficiency and quality. When over-relying, you may become too harsh. This year, practice balancing efficiency with humanity.

水.headline: Insight module
水.content: Water energy represents your insight module, the built-in system for perception and data processing. When strong, you think deeply, discern well, and handle complex information; when weak, you experience mental exhaustion and narrow vision. Use this energy for deep thinking and information integration to boost decision quality. When over-relying, you may overthink and underact. This year, practice balancing thought with action.
